mapper.insert: insert into users (name, nickname, sns_id, sns_type, birthday, profile_image, gender, birthyear, mobile, mobile_e164, create_date) values ( #{name}, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{sns_type}, #{birthday}, #{profile_image}, #{gender}, #{birthyear}, #{mobile}, #{mobile_e164}, now() )
mapper.select: select id, name, nickname, sns_id, sns_type, birthday, profile_image, gender, birthyear, mobile, mobile_e164, create_date from users where 1=1 and sns_type = #{sns_type} and sns_id = #{sns_id}
